entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 07:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
